main event: A flaming green object streaked across the sky over Michigan on February 24, 1959.
interesting points: The object was reported as traveling from east to west,Several witnesses including airport control tower operators described the object as disintegrating,The sighting was confirmed by multiple radio stations receiving calls from the public,The object was visible for about 3-4 seconds,The operators described it as a 'good-sized one' that shot off sparks before breaking apart.
witness description: airport control tower operators and citizens
